assignment_steps.title: List all the activities related to BW

Identification of problems in the process flow
Implementation of the process flow in BW
Review existing job descriptions of WBA & PtSA
Store small parts in boxes in the front & big parts on pallets
Label positions (tables, boxes) for their input
